00108 /*<<<DD_SDMMC_API_1>>> */
00109 /*
00110  * The function initializes the Host Controller with the reset values and
00111  * configure values in the Host Controller registers.
00112  */
00113 status_t SDMMC004_HostControllerInit(void)
00114 {
00115   status_t Status = (uint32_t) DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00116   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00117   do
00118   {
00119     /*<<<DD_SDMMC_API_1_1>>> */
00120     /* Check Host Controller is initialized or not */
00121     if ((SDMMC004_Handle.State & SDMMC004_STATE_HC_INITIALIZED) != 0)
00122     {
00123       Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_HOST_CONTROLLER_INITIALIZED;
00124       break;
00125     }
00126     /* 1. Reset the registers to default values in Software Reset Control
00127      * Register
00128      */
00129     /*<<<DD_SDMMC_API_1_2>>> */
00130     Status  = SDMMC004_lReset( SDMMC_SW_RESET_SW_RST_ALL_Msk );
00131     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00132     {
00133       break;
00134     }
00135     /* Set Clock Control  register */
00136     SDMMC->CLOCK_CTRL |= ((SDMMC_CLOCK_CTRL_SDCLK_FREQ_SEL_Msk & \
00137         (SDMMC004_CTRL_SDCLK_FREQ_SEL_VALUE << \
00138             SDMMC_CLOCK_CTRL_SDCLK_FREQ_SEL_Pos)) |\
00139             (SDMMC_CLOCK_CTRL_INTERNAL_CLOCK_EN_Msk) \
00140     );
00141     /* Set Normal Interrupt Status Enable & Error Interrupt Status Enable register */
00142     SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM = SDMMC004_NORMAL_INT_STATUS_ENABLE;
00143     SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_ERR = SDMMC004_ERROR_INT_STATUS_ENABLE ;
00144 
00145     /* Set Interrupt Signal Enable & Error Interrupt Signal Enable register*/
00146     SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM = SDMMC004_NORMAL_INT_SIGNAL_ENABLE;
00147     SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_ERR = SDMMC004_ERROR_INT_SIGNAL_ENABLE;
00148 
00149     /* Set Timeout Control Register */
00150     SDMMC->TIMEOUT_CTRL |= ( SDMMC_TIMEOUT_CTRL_DAT_TIMEOUT_CNT_VAL_Msk &\
00151         ( SDMMC004_CTRL_DAT_TIMEOUT_CNT_VAL_VALUE << \
00152             SDMMC_TIMEOUT_CTRL_DAT_TIMEOUT_CNT_VAL_Pos )\
00153     );
00154     /* Set bus voltage in the Power Control Register */
00155     SDMMC->POWER_CTRL |= ( SDMMC_POWER_CTRL_SD_BUS_VOLTAGE_SEL_Msk &\
00156         (SDMMC004_CTRL_SD_BUS_VOLTAGE_SEL_VALUE  << \
00157             SDMMC_POWER_CTRL_SD_BUS_VOLTAGE_SEL_Pos )
00158     );
00159     Status = SDMMC004_lCreateOSResources();
00160     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00161     {
00162       break;
00163     } 
00164     /* Update the state status to card initialized  */
00165     SDMMC004_Handle.State |= (SDMMC004_STATE_HC_INITIALIZED | SDMMC004_STATE_NO_CARD) ;
00166   } while(0);
00167   /* Debug Log message .*/
00168   INFO(GID_SDMMC00x,Status,0,0);
00169   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00170   return Status;
00171 }
00172 
00173 /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_2 >>> */
00174 /*
00175  * The function de-initialize the Host Controller to the reset values.
00176  */
00177 status_t  SDMMC004_HostControllerDeInit(void)
00178 {
00179   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_ERROR;
00180   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00181   do
00182   {
00183     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_2_1>>> */
00184     /* Check the host controller is initialized or not */
00185     if((SDMMC004_Handle.State & SDMMC004_STATE_HC_INITIALIZED) == 0)
00186     {
00187       break;
00188     }/*End of"if((SDMMC004_Handle.State & SDMMC004_STATE_HC_INITIALIZED)== 0)"*/
00189     /* Cleanup the card. */
00190     SDMMC004_lCardCleanUp();
00191     /* Reset the Host Controller registers */
00192     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_2_2>>> */
00193     Status = SDMMC004_lReset( SDMMC_SW_RESET_SW_RST_ALL_Msk );
00194     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00195     {
00196       break;
00197     }
00198     Status = (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00199   } while(0);
00200   /* Debug Log message .*/
00201   INFO(GID_SDMMC00x,Status,0,0);
00202   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00203   return Status;
00204 }
00205 
00206 /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_3>>> */
00207 /*
00208  * The function is used to read multiple blocks of data from the card.
00209  */
00210 status_t SDMMC004_CardReadMultipleBlocks
00211 (
00212   uint32_t  *ReadBufPtr,
00213   uint32_t  ReadAddr,
00214   uint32_t  NumberOfBlocks
00215 )
00216 {
00217   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_READ_ERROR;
00218   osStatus SemStatus;
00219   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00220   do
00221   {
00222     /* Take Data Mutex for Re-entrancy*/
00223     SemStatus = osMutexWait(SDMMC004_DataMutexId,  osWaitForever );
00224     if (osOK != SemStatus)
00225     {
00226       break;
00227     } /* End of " if ((uint32_t)osOK != SemStatus)"*/
00228     SDMMC004_Handle.CommandInterruptError = SDMMC004_ERROR;
00229     SDMMC004_Handle.DataInterruptError = SDMMC004_ERROR;
00230     SDMMC004_Handle.TransferInterruptError = SDMMC004_ERROR;
00231     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_3_1>>> */
00232     /*Check Whether Initialization Process is successful */
00233     if (SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag != 1 )
00234     {
00235       Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;     
00236       break;
00237     }
00238     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_3_2>>> */
00239     /* Check Sector number is not out of bound */
00240     Status = SDMMC004_lCheckSectorBound(ReadAddr,NumberOfBlocks);
00241     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00242     {
00243       break;
00244     }
00245     /* Set transfer direction select in the Transfer Mode Register */
00246     SET_BIT( SDMMC->TRANSFER_MODE,SDMMC_TRANSFER_MODE_TX_DIR_SELECT_Pos);
00247     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_3_3>>> */
00248     /* Send Multiple Block  Read Command i.e CMD18 */
00249     Status = SDMMC004_lMultiBlockTransfer( &ReadAddr, NumberOfBlocks, \
00250                                            &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(18)), \
00251                                            ReadBufPtr, SDMMC004_READ_FROM_BUFF);
00252   } while(0);
00253   /* Release Data Mutex */
00254   if (osOK == SemStatus)
00255   {
00256     SemStatus = osMutexRelease (SDMMC004_DataMutexId);
00257     if (SemStatus != osOK)
00258     {
00259       Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_READ_ERROR;
00260     } /* End of "if (osOK != SemStatus)"*/
00261   }/* End of " if (SemStatus != osOK)" */
00262   /* Debug Log message .*/
00263   INFO(GID_SDMMC00x,Status,0,0);
00264   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00265   return Status;
00266 }
00267 
00268 /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_4>>> */
00269 /*
00270  * The function is used to read single block of data from the card.
00271  */
00272 status_t SDMMC004_CardReadSingleBlock
00273 (
00274   uint32_t *ReadBufPtr,
00275   uint32_t  ReadAddr
00276 )
00277 {
00278   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_READ_ERROR;
00279   uint32_t SectorCount = 1UL;
00280   osStatus SemStatus;
00281   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00282   do
00283   {
00284     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_4_1>>> */
00285     /*Check Whether Initialization Process is successful */
00286     if (SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag != 1 )
00287     {
00288       Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
00289       break;
00290     }
00291     /* Take Data Mutex for re-entrancy */
00292     SemStatus = osMutexWait(SDMMC004_DataMutexId,  osWaitForever );
00293     if (osOK != SemStatus)
00294     {
00295       break;
00296     } /* End of " if ((uint32_t)osOK != SemStatus)"*/
00297     SDMMC004_Handle.CommandInterruptError = SDMMC004_ERROR;
00298     SDMMC004_Handle.DataInterruptError = SDMMC004_ERROR;
00299     SDMMC004_Handle.TransferInterruptError = SDMMC004_ERROR;
00300     
00301     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_4_2>>> */
00302     /* Check Sector number is not out of bound */
00303     Status = SDMMC004_lCheckSectorBound(ReadAddr,SectorCount);
00304     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00305     {
00306       break;
00307     }
00308     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_4_3>>> */
00309     /* Block Addressing or Byte Addressing */
00310     if ((SDMMC004_Handle.CardType & SDMMC004_BLOCK_ADDRESSING) == 0UL)
00311     {
00312       ReadAddr *= 512UL;
00313     } /*End of "if((SDMMC004_Handle.CardType & SDMMC004_BLOCK_ADDRESSING)== 0UL)"*/
00314     /* Set Direction select in transfer mode register */
00315     SET_BIT( SDMMC->TRANSFER_MODE,SDMMC_TRANSFER_MODE_TX_DIR_SELECT_Pos);
00316     /* Perform the Single block transfer operation */
00317     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_4_4>>> */
00318     Status = SDMMC004_lSingleBlockTransfer( &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(17)), \
00319                                             ReadAddr, SDMMC004_BLOCK_SIZE, \
00320                                             ReadBufPtr, SDMMC004_READ_FROM_BUFF);
00321   } while(0);
00322   /* Release Mutex */
00323   if (SemStatus == osOK)
00324   {
00325     SemStatus =  osMutexRelease (SDMMC004_DataMutexId);
00326     if (SemStatus != osOK)
00327     {
00328       Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_READ_ERROR;
00329     } /* End of "if (osOK != SemStatus)"*/
00330   }/* End of "if (SemStatus != (uint32_t)osOK)"*/
00331   /* Debug Log message .*/
00332   INFO(GID_SDMMC00x,Status,0,0);
00333   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00334   return Status;
00335 }
00336 
00337 /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_5>>> */
00338 /*
00339  * The function is used to write multiple blocks of data on the card.
00340  */
00341 status_t SDMMC004_CardWriteMultipleBlocks
00342 (
00343   const uint32_t *WriteBufPtr,
00344   uint32_t WriteAddr,
00345   uint32_t NumberOfBlocks
00346 )
00347 {
00348   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_WRITE_ERROR; 
00349   osStatus SemStatus ;
00350   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00351   do
00352   {
00353     /* Take Data Mutex for Re-entrancy*/
00354     SemStatus = osMutexWait(SDMMC004_DataMutexId,  osWaitForever );
00355     if (osOK != SemStatus)
00356     {
00357       break;
00358     } /* End of " if ((uint32_t)osOK != SemStatus)"*/
00359     SDMMC004_Handle.CommandInterruptError = SDMMC004_ERROR;
00360     SDMMC004_Handle.DataInterruptError = SDMMC004_ERROR;
00361     SDMMC004_Handle.TransferInterruptError = SDMMC004_ERROR;
00362     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_5_1>>> */
00363     /*Check Whether Initialization Process is successfull */
00364     if (SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag != 1 )
00365     {
00366       Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
00367       break;
00368     }
00369     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_5_2>>> */
00370     /* Check Sector number is not out of bound */
00371     Status = SDMMC004_lCheckSectorBound(WriteAddr,NumberOfBlocks);
00372     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00373     {
00374       break;
00375     }
00376     /* Clear transfer direction select in Transfer Mode Register */
00377     CLR_BIT( SDMMC->TRANSFER_MODE,SDMMC_TRANSFER_MODE_TX_DIR_SELECT_Pos);
00378 
00379     /* Send Multiple Block  Write  Command i.e CMD25 */
00380     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_5_3>>> */
00381     Status = SDMMC004_lMultiBlockTransfer( &WriteAddr,  NumberOfBlocks,\
00382                                            &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(25)),\
00383                                            (uint32_t *)WriteBufPtr,\
00384                                            SDMMC004_WRITE_INTO_BUFF );
00385   } while(0);
00386   /* Release Data Mutex */
00387   if (SemStatus == osOK)
00388   {
00389     SemStatus =  osMutexRelease (SDMMC004_DataMutexId);
00390     if (SemStatus != osOK)
00391     {
00392       Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_WRITE_ERROR;
00393     } /* End of "if ((uint32_t)osOK != SemStatus)"*/
00394   } /* End of "if(SemStatus != (uint32_t)osOK)"*/
00395 
00396   /* Debug Log message .*/
00397   INFO(GID_SDMMC00x,Status,0,0);
00398   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00399   return Status;
00400 }
00401 
00402 /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_6>>> */
00403 /*
00404  * The function is used to write single block of data on the card.
00405  */
00406 status_t SDMMC004_CardWriteSingleBlock
00407 (
00408     const uint32_t *WriteBufPtr,
00409     uint32_t WriteAddr
00410 )
00411 {
00412   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_WRITE_ERROR;
00413   uint32_t SectorCount = 1UL;
00414   osStatus SemStatus ;
00415   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00416   do
00417   {
00418     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_6_1>>> */
00419     /*Check Whether Initialization Process is successfull */
00420     if (SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag != 1 )
00421     {
00422       Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
00423       break;
00424     }
00425     /* Take Data Mutex for re-entrancy */
00426     SemStatus = osMutexWait(SDMMC004_DataMutexId,  osWaitForever );
00427     if (osOK != SemStatus)
00428     {
00429       break;
00430     } /* End of " if ((uint32_t)osOK != SemStatus)"*/
00431     SDMMC004_Handle.CommandInterruptError = SDMMC004_ERROR;
00432     SDMMC004_Handle.DataInterruptError = SDMMC004_ERROR;
00433     SDMMC004_Handle.TransferInterruptError = SDMMC004_ERROR;
00434     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_6_2>>> */
00435     /* Check Sector number is not out of bound */
00436     Status = SDMMC004_lCheckSectorBound(WriteAddr,SectorCount);
00437     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00438     {
00439       break;
00440     }
00441     /* If not Block Addressing then multiply by 512 bytes. */
00442     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_6_3>>> */
00443     if ((SDMMC004_Handle.CardType & SDMMC004_BLOCK_ADDRESSING) == 0UL)
00444     {
00445       WriteAddr *= 512UL;
00446     } /*End of "if((SDMMC004_Handle.CardType & SDMMC004_BLOCK_ADDRESSING) == 0UL)"*/
00447     
00448     /* Clear Transfer Direction Select bit in Transfer Mode Register */
00449     CLR_BIT( SDMMC->TRANSFER_MODE,SDMMC_TRANSFER_MODE_TX_DIR_SELECT_Pos);
00450     
00451     /* Single Block Transfer function */
00452     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_6_4>>> */
00453     Status = SDMMC004_lSingleBlockTransfer( &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(24)), \
00454                                            WriteAddr, SDMMC004_BLOCK_SIZE, \
00455                                            (uint32_t *)WriteBufPtr, \
00456                                             SDMMC004_WRITE_INTO_BUFF);
00457   } while(0);
00458   /*Release Mutex */
00459   if (SemStatus == osOK)
00460   {
00461     SemStatus =  osMutexRelease (SDMMC004_DataMutexId);
00462     if (SemStatus != osOK)
00463     {
00464       Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_WRITE_ERROR;
00465     } /* End of "if ((uint32_t)osOK != SemStatus)"*/
00466   }/* if (SemStatus != osOK)*/
00467   /* Debug Log message .*/
00468   INFO(GID_SDMMC00x,Status,0,0);
00469   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00470   return Status;
00471 }
00472 
00473 /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_7>>> */
00474 /*
00475  * The function is used to erase data from the card.
00476  */
00477 status_t SDMMC004_EraseBlock
00478 (
00479   uint32_t StartAddr,
00480   uint32_t EndAddr
00481 )
00482 {
00483   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_ERROR;
00484   uint32_t NumOfSectors = 0;
00485   /* Allocation Unit to No. of Sectors in 1 AU table mapping*/
00486   uint32_t AuToSectors[10] = { 0,   32,  64,  128,  256,
00487                                512, 1024, 2048, 4096, 8192
00488                              };
00489   uint16_t EraseSize = 0;
00490   uint8_t EraseOffset = 0;
00491   uint8_t EraseTimeout = 0;
00492   uint8_t AUSize = 0;
00493   uint32_t SectorsInAu = 0;
00494   uint32_t SectorsInEraseCluster = 0;
00495   /* Read SD Status  */
00496   uint32_t SdStatus[16] = {0};
00497   uint32_t EraseTimeoutPerCluster = 0;
00498   osStatus SemStatus ;
00499   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00500   do
00501   {
00502     /* Take Data Mutex */
00503     SemStatus = osMutexWait(SDMMC004_DataMutexId,  osWaitForever );
00504     if (osOK != SemStatus)
00505     {
00506       break;
00507     } /* End of " if (osOK != SemStatus)"*/
00508     SDMMC004_Handle.DataInterruptError = SDMMC004_ERROR;
00509     SDMMC004_Handle.TransferInterruptError = SDMMC004_ERROR;
00510     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_7_1>>> */
00511     /*Check Whether Initialization Process is successful */
00512     if (SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag != 1 )
00513     {
00514       Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
00515       break;
00516     }
00517     NumOfSectors = EndAddr - StartAddr;
00518     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_7_2>>> */
00519     /* Check Sector number is not out of bound */
00520     Status = SDMMC004_lCheckSectorBound(StartAddr,NumOfSectors);
00521     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00522     {
00523       break;
00524     }
00525     /* Erase Timeout Calculation */
00526     /* Get SD Status */
00527     Status  = SDMMC004_GetSdStatus((void*)&(SdStatus[0]));
00528     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_7_3>>> */
00529     if (Status != DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00530     {
00531       break;
00532     }
00533     /* Bits 400-401 in SD status is Erase Offset */
00534     EraseOffset =  ((SdStatus[3] & 0x00000300)) >> 8;
00535     /* Bits 402-407 in SD status is Erase Timeout */
00536     EraseTimeout = ((SdStatus[3] & 0x0000FC00)) >> 10;
00537     /* Bits 408-423 in SD status is Erase Size */
00538     EraseSize =   (  (((SdStatus[2] & 0xFF000000) >> 24) << 8) |
00539         (SdStatus[3] & 0x000000FF)
00540     );
00541     /* Bits 428-431 in SD status is Allocation unit Size*/
00542     AUSize  =    (( SdStatus[2] & 0x00F00000) >> 20);
00543 
00544     /* Erase Timeout Calculations */
00545     EraseTimeoutPerCluster = (EraseTimeout/EraseSize) +  EraseOffset  ;
00546 
00547     /* Number of Sectors in 1AU */
00548     SectorsInAu = AuToSectors[AUSize];
00549     SectorsInEraseCluster = SectorsInAu * EraseSize;
00550 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
00551     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_TC23_1Error == TRUE)
00552     {
00553       Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_EraseStartError = TRUE;
00554     }
00555     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_TC23_1Error == TRUE)
00556     {
00557       Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_EraseEndError = TRUE;
00558     }
00559 #endif
00560     while (NumOfSectors > SectorsInEraseCluster)
00561     {
00562       Status = SDMMC004_lLocalErase(StartAddr,(StartAddr + SectorsInEraseCluster), \
00563                                     EraseTimeoutPerCluster);
00564       if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00565       {
00566         break;
00567       }
00568       StartAddr = StartAddr + SectorsInEraseCluster;
00569       NumOfSectors = NumOfSectors - SectorsInEraseCluster;
00570     }
00571     if (NumOfSectors != 0 )
00572     {
00573       Status = SDMMC004_lLocalErase(StartAddr,EndAddr,EraseTimeoutPerCluster);
00574       if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00575       {
00576         break;
00577       }
00578     }
00579   } while(0);
00580   /*Releasing the Semaphore */
00581   if (SemStatus == osOK)
00582   {
00583    SemStatus =  osMutexRelease (SDMMC004_DataMutexId);
00584    if (SemStatus != osOK)
00585    {
00586      Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_SENDCOMMAND_ERROR;
00587    } /* End of "if ((uint32_t)osOK != SemStatus)"*/
00588   }
00589   /* Debug Log message .*/
00590   INFO(GID_SDMMC00x,Status,0,0);
00591   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00592   return Status;
00593 }
00594 
00595 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_8 >>> */
00596 /*
00597  * The function is used to perform the security operations on the card i.e Set,
00598  * clear passwd, lock/unlock card
00599  */
00600 status_t  SDMMC004_LockUnlockCard
00601 (
00602   SDMMC004_LocalLockStructType  *LockPtr,
00603   SDMMC004_CardLockMode OperationMode
00604 )
00605 {
00606   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_ERROR;
00607   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00608   do
00609   {
00610     /*  Select the Card before proceeding */
00611     Status = SDMMC004_lSwitchToTransferState();
00612     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_8_1 >>> */
00613     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00614     {
00615       break;
00616     }/* End of "if(Status != DAVEApp_SUCCESS)" */
00617     /*  Send Cmd42 and write the Lock data structure */
00618     /*  Set Transfer Mode Register */
00619     CLR_BIT( SDMMC->TRANSFER_MODE, SDMMC_TRANSFER_MODE_TX_DIR_SELECT_Pos);
00620     Status = SDMMC004_lSingleBlockTransfer( &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(42)),\
00621                                            SDMMC004_ARGUMENT0, 512,  \
00622                                           (uint32_t *)LockPtr,SDMMC004_WRITE_INTO_BUFF);
00623     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_8_2 >>> */
00624     if(Status == (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00625     {
00626       Status = SDMMC004_lCheckLockStatus(OperationMode);
00627     }/* End of "if(Status == DAVEApp_SUCCESS)" */
00628   } while(0);
00629   /* Debug Log message .*/
00630   INFO(GID_SDMMC00x,Status,0,0);
00631   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00632   return Status;
00633 }
00634 
00635 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_9 >>> */
00636 /*
00637  * The function is used to get the lock status from the card.
00638  */
00639 status_t  SDMMC004_GetLockStatus( uint32_t *LockStatusPtr)
00640 {
00641   uint32_t CardStatus = 0UL;
00642   uint32_t Argument = 0;
00643   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_ERROR;
00644   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00645   do
00646   {      
00647 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
00648     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_LockStatusError == TRUE)
00649     {
00650       /* Forcefully trigger the Command Timeout Error Interrupt */
00651       SDMMC->FORCE_EVENT_ERR_STATUS = 0x0001 ;
00652       /* Disable the Command Complete Status Interrupt */
00653       SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk);
00654       /* Disable the Command Complete Signal Interrupt */
00655       SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk );
00656     }
00657 #endif
00658     Argument |= SDMMC004_CardInfo.Rca << SDMMC004_ARG_RCA_BITPOS;
00659     /* Send Cmd13 to read card status  */
00660     Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(13)),Argument, \
00661                                     SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1, &CardStatus);
00662     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_9_1 >>> */
00663     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00664     {
00665       break;
00666     }
00667     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_9_2 >>> */
00668     /* Lock/Unlock Status bit in the CSR Register */
00669     if ((CardStatus & SDMMC004_CSR_CARD_IS_LOCKED_BITMASK) != 0UL)
00670     {
00671       *LockStatusPtr = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_CARD_IS_LOCKED;
00672     }/* End of "if ((CardStatus & SDMMC004_CSR_CARD_IS_LOCKED_BITMASK) != 0)"*/
00673     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_9_3 >>> */
00674     else
00675     {
00676       *LockStatusPtr = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_CARD_UNLOCKED;
00677     }
00678   } while(0);
00679   /* Debug Log message .*/
00680   INFO(GID_SDMMC00x,Status,0,0);
00681   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00682   return Status;
00683 }
00684 
00685 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_10 >>> */
00686 /*
00687  * This function is use to  get card's current state.
00688  */
00689 status_t SDMMC004_GetCurrentState()
00690 {
00691   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_STATE_NO_CARD;
00692   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x,(uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00693 
00694   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_10_1>>> */
00695   if ((SDMMC004_Handle.State & SDMMC004_STATE_CARD_INITIALIZED))
00696   {
00697     Status &= ~(SDMMC004_STATE_NO_CARD);
00698     Status |= SDMMC004_STATE_CARD_INITIALIZED;
00699   }
00700   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_10_2>>> */
00701   if ((SDMMC004_Handle.State & SDMMC004_STATE_CARD_WRITE_PROTECT) != 0)
00702   {
00703     Status |= SDMMC004_STATE_CARD_WRITE_PROTECT;
00704   }
00705   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_10_3>>> */
00706   if ((SDMMC004_Handle.State & SDMMC004_STATE_CARD_LOCKED) != 0)
00707   {
00708     Status |= SDMMC004_STATE_CARD_LOCKED;
00709   }
00710   /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_10_4>>> */
00711   if ((SDMMC004_Handle.State & SDMMC004_STATE_HC_INITIALIZED) != 0)
00712   {
00713     Status |= SDMMC004_STATE_HC_INITIALIZED;
00714   }
00715   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00716   return Status;
00717 }
00718 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_11 >>> */
00719 /*
00720  * This function is use to  get card type information
00721  */
00722 status_t SDMMC004_GetCardType(uint32_t* CardTypePtr)
00723 {
00724   status_t Status = (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00725   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00726   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_11_1 >>> */
00727   /*Check Whether Initialization Process is successful */
00728   if (SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag != 1 )
00729   {
00730     Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
00731   }
00732   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_11_2 >>> */
00733   else
00734   {
00735     *CardTypePtr = SDMMC004_Handle.CardType;
00736   } 
00737   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00738   return Status;
00739 }
00740 
00741 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_12 >>> */
00742 /* This function is use to Get CID register information of card */
00743 status_t SDMMC004_GetCid (void *Buffer)
00744 {
00745   SDMMC004_SDCIDType* Tmp = (SDMMC004_SDCIDType*)Buffer;
00746   status_t Status = (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00747   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00748   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_12_1 >>> */
00749   /*Check Whether Initialization Process is successful */
00750   if (SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag != 1 )
00751   {
00752     Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
00753   }
00754   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_12_2 >>> */
00755   else
00756   {
00757     Tmp->ManufacturingDate = (SDMMC004_CardInfo.CidArray[0])&0xFFF;
00758     Tmp->ProductSerialNum =  (SDMMC004_CardInfo.CidArray[1]<<16) | \
00759                              (SDMMC004_CardInfo.CidArray[0]>>16);
00760     Tmp->ProductRev =  (SDMMC004_CardInfo.CidArray[1]>>16)&0xff;
00761     Tmp->ProductName[0] =  (SDMMC004_CardInfo.CidArray[2]>>24)&0xff;
00762     Tmp->ProductName[1] =  (SDMMC004_CardInfo.CidArray[2]>>16)&0xff;
00763     Tmp->ProductName[2] =  (SDMMC004_CardInfo.CidArray[2]>>8)&0xff;
00764     Tmp->ProductName[3] =  (SDMMC004_CardInfo.CidArray[2]>>0)&0xff;
00765     Tmp->ProductName[4] =  (SDMMC004_CardInfo.CidArray[1]>>24)&0xff;
00766     Tmp->AppOEMId[0] = (SDMMC004_CardInfo.CidArray[3]>>8)&0xff;
00767     Tmp->AppOEMId[1] = (SDMMC004_CardInfo.CidArray[3])&0xff;
00768     Tmp->ManufacturerId = (SDMMC004_CardInfo.CidArray[3]>>16)&0xff;
00769   }
00770   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00771   return Status;
00772 }
00773 
00774 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_13>>> */
00775 /*
00776  * This function is use to  Get OCR information on the card
00777  */
00778 status_t SDMMC004_GetOcr (void *Buffer)
00779 {
00780   status_t Status = (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00781   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00782   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_13_1>>> */
00783   /*Check Whether Initialization Process is successful */
00784   if (SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag != 1 )
00785   {
00786     Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
00787   }
00788   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_13_2>>> */
00789   else
00790   {
00791     *(uint32_t *)Buffer = SDMMC004_CardInfo.Ocr;
00792   }
00793   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00794   return Status;
00795 }
00796 
00797 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_14>>> */
00798 /* This function is use to get CSD information on the card */
00799 status_t SDMMC004_GetCsd (void *Buffer)
00800 {
00801   status_t Status = (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00802   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00803   /*Check Whether Initialization Process is successful */
00804   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_14_1>>> */
00805   if (SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag != 1 )
00806   {
00807     Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
00808   }
00809   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_14_2>>> */
00810   else
00811   {
00812     /* CSD Structure includes 7-bit CRC  1-bit fixed bit which is not sent by the card.
00813     So while copying skip one byte and copy in the structure*/
00814     memcpy(((uint8_t *)Buffer + 1),(void *)SDMMC004_CardInfo.CsdArray,15);
00815   }
00816   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00817   return Status;
00818 }
00819 
00820 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_15 >>> */
00821 /*
00822  * This function is use to get number of sectors present on the card.
00823  */
00824 status_t SDMMC004_GetSectorCount( void *Buffer )
00825 {
00826   uint32_t Mult = 0;
00827   status_t Status ;
00828   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00829   do
00830   {
00831     /*<<<DD_SDMMC_API_15_1>>> */
00832     /*Check Whether Initialization Process is successful */
00833     if (SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag != 1 )
00834     {
00835       Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
00836       break;
00837     }
00838     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_15_2 >>> */
00839     if ((SDMMC004_Handle.CardType & SDMMC004_SD_HIGH_CAPACITY)!= 0)
00840     {
00841       SDMMC004_CSDV2Type TmpCsdV2 = {0};
00842       /*Get CSD function */
00843       Status = SDMMC004_GetCsd((void *)&TmpCsdV2);
00844       /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_15_3 >>> */
00845       if( Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00846       {
00847         break;
00848       } /* End of "if( Status != DAVEApp_SUCCESS)" */
00849       /* For High Capacity SD card, (C_SIZE field value + 1) * 1024 gives the 
00850          sector count*/
00851       *(uint32_t *)Buffer = (((TmpCsdV2.DeviceSizeHigh << 16UL) |   \
00852                             (TmpCsdV2.DeviceSizeLower ) )+ 1 ) << 10;
00853     }/* End of "if((SDMMC004_Handle.CardType & SDMMC004_SD_HIGH_CAPACITY)!= 0)"*/
00854     /* For Standard SD card & MMC card  ,
00855      * Sector Count =  (Device Size + 1) * Mult, where Mult =  2 ^ C_SIZE_MULT*/
00856 #if SDMMC_SUPPORT_MMC_CARD
00857     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_15_4 >>> */
00858     else if( (uint8_t)(SDMMC004_Handle.CardType == SDMMC004_MMC) != 0)
00859     {
00860       SDMMC004_MMCCSDType TmpMmcCsd = {0};
00861       /*Get csd function */
00862       Status = SDMMC004_GetCsd((void *)&TmpMmcCsd);
00863       /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_15_5 >>> */
00864       if( Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00865       {
00866         break;
00867       }
00868       /* As per Specs Sector Count is:
00869        * BLOCKNR = (C_SIZE+1) * MULT  , where MULT = 2^C_SIZE_MULT+2 (C_SIZE_MULT < 8)*/
00870       Mult = 1 << (TmpMmcCsd.DeviceSizeMult + 2) ;
00871       *(uint32_t *)Buffer = (((TmpMmcCsd.DeviceSizeHigh << 10UL) |  \
00872           (TmpMmcCsd.DeviceSizeLower ))+ 1) * Mult ;
00873     }
00874 #endif
00875     /* Standard SD card */
00876     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_15_6 >>> */
00877     else
00878     {
00879       SDMMC004_CSDV1Type TmpCsdV1 = {0};
00880       /*Get CSD function */
00881       Status = SDMMC004_GetCsd((void *)&TmpCsdV1);
00882       /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_15_7 >>> */
00883       if( Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
00884       {
00885         break;
00886       }
00887       /* Left Shift evaluates 1* 2^(TmpMmcCsd.DeviceSizeMult + 2)*/
00888       Mult = (TmpCsdV1.DeviceSizeMult + TmpCsdV1.ReadBlkLen - 7);
00889       /* Sector Count = Device_size * Mult.*/
00890       *(uint32_t *)Buffer = (((TmpCsdV1.DeviceSizeHigh << 2) |   \
00891                             (TmpCsdV1.DeviceSizeLower ))+ 1) <<  Mult;
00892     } /* End of "Else SD card " */
00893   } while(0);
00894   /* Debug Log message .*/
00895   INFO(GID_SDMMC00x,Status,0,0);
00896   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00897   return Status;
00898 }
00899 
00900 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_16 >>> */
00901 /*
00902  * This function is use to get Sector Size info from the card
00903  */
00904 status_t SDMMC004_GetSectorSize(void *Buffer)
00905 {
00906   status_t Status = (uint32_t) DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00907   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00908   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_16_1 >>> */
00909   /*Check Whether Initialization Process is successful */
00910   if (SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag != 1 )
00911   {
00912     Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
00913   }
00914   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_16_2 >>> */
00915   else
00916   {
00917     /* Sector Size is fixed to 512bytes.*/
00918     *(uint16_t *)Buffer = 512UL;
00919   }
00920   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00921   return Status;
00922 }
00923 
00924 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_17 >>> */
00925 /*
00926  *  This function returns erase block size of the card in unit of sector into
00927  *  the DWORD variable pointed by Buffer
00928  */
00929 
00930 status_t SDMMC004_GetBlockSize(void *Buffer)
00931 {
00932   status_t Status = (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00933   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00934   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_17_1 >>> */
00935   /*Check Whether Initialization Process is successful */
00936   if (SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag != 1 )
00937   {
00938     Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
00939   }
00940   /* SD High capacity card i.e. CSD V2*/
00941   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_17_2 >>> */
00942   else if ((SDMMC004_Handle.CardType & SDMMC004_SD_HIGH_CAPACITY) != 0)
00943   {
00944     SDMMC004_CSDV2Type TmpCsdV2 = {0};
00945     /*Get CSD function */
00946     Status = SDMMC004_GetCsd((void *)&TmpCsdV2);
00947     *(uint32_t *)Buffer = TmpCsdV2.EraseSectorSize + 1;
00948   }
00949 #if SDMMC_SUPPORT_MMC_CARD
00950   /* SDMMC_MMC card */
00951   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_17_3 >>> */
00952   else if ((SDMMC004_Handle.CardType & SDMMC004_MMC )!= 0)
00953   {
00954     SDMMC004_MMCCSDType TmpMmcCsd = {0};
00955     /*Get CSD function */
00956     Status = SDMMC004_GetCsd((void *)&TmpMmcCsd);
00957     *(uint32_t *)Buffer = (TmpMmcCsd.EraseGrpSize + 1) * \
00958                           (TmpMmcCsd.EraseGrpMult + 1);
00959   }
00960 #endif
00961   /* SD standard capacity card i.e. CSD V1*/
00962   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_17_4 >>> */
00963   else
00964   {
00965     SDMMC004_CSDV1Type TmpCsdV1  = {0};
00966     /*Get csd function */
00967     Status = SDMMC004_GetCsd((void *)&TmpCsdV1);
00968     *(uint32_t *)Buffer = TmpCsdV1.EraseSectorSize + 1;
00969   }
00970   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00971   return  Status;
00972 }
00973 
00974 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_18 >>> */
00975 /*
00976  *  This function Flushes Disk Cache from the card
00977  */
00978 status_t SDMMC004_FlushDiskWriteCache()
00979 {
00980   status_t Status  = (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00981   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00982   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_18_1 >>> */
00983   /*Check Whether Initialization Process is successful */
00984   if (SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag != 1 )
00985   {
00986     Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_INIT_FAIL;
00987   }
00988   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00989   return Status;
00990 }
00991 
00992 /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_19>>> */
00993 /*
00994  * This function is use to Get SD Status Information
00995  */
00996 status_t SDMMC004_GetSdStatus(void *Buffer)
00997 {
00998   uint32_t Argument = 0;
00999   uint32_t CardStatus = 0;
01000   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_ERROR;
01001   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
01002   do
01003   {
01004 
01005 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
01006     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_CommandErrorInterrupt== TRUE)
01007     {
01008       /* Disable the Command Complete Status Interrupt */
01009       SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk);
01010       /* Disable the Command Complete Signal Interrupt */
01011       SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk );
01012     }
01013 #endif
01014     /* Select the card ie.cmd7 */
01015     Status = SDMMC004_lSwitchToTransferState();
01016     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_19_1>>> */
01017     if( Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
01018     {
01019       break;
01020     }
01021     /* Send the Application Specific Command i.e. Command 55.*/
01022 #if SDMMC_UVP_TEST
01023     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_Cmd55_TC54 == TRUE)
01024     {
01025       Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_Cmd55Error = TRUE;
01026     }
01027     if (Test_TriggerInterrupt.Trigger_Cmd55Error == TRUE)
01028     {
01029       /* Disable the Command Complete Status Interrupt */
01030       SDMMC->EN_INT_STATUS_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_STATUS_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk);
01031       /* Disable the Command Complete Signal Interrupt */
01032       SDMMC->EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM &= ~( SDMMC_EN_INT_SIGNAL_NORM_CMD_COMPLETE_EN_Msk );
01033     }
01034 #endif
01035     Argument |= SDMMC004_CardInfo.Rca << SDMMC004_ARG_RCA_BITPOS;
01036     Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand(&(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(55)),Argument, \
01037                                    SDMMC004_RESPONSE_R1,&CardStatus);
01038     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_19_2>>> */
01039     if( Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
01040     {
01041       break;
01042     }
01043     /*  Set Transfer Mode Register */
01044     SET_BIT( SDMMC->TRANSFER_MODE, SDMMC_TRANSFER_MODE_TX_DIR_SELECT_Pos);
01045     /* Read the SD status from the data line */
01046     /* <<<DD_SDMMC_API_19_3>>> */
01047     Status = SDMMC004_lSingleBlockTransfer( &(SDMMC004_SD_COMMAND(59)),\
01048                                              SDMMC004_ARGUMENT0,64,\
01049                                              (uint32_t*)Buffer,\
01050                                              SDMMC004_READ_FROM_BUFF);
01051   } while(0);
01052 
01053   /* Debug Log message .*/
01054   INFO(GID_SDMMC00x,Status,0,0);
01055   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_SDMMC00x, (uint32_t)SDMMC004_FUNCTION_EXIT);
01056   return Status;
01057 }
01058 
01059 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_20 >>> */
01060 /*
01061  * This function is use to  deactivate the  Card
01062  */
01063 status_t SDMMC004_EjectCard()
01064 {
01065   status_t Status = (uint32_t)SDMMC004_ERROR;
01066   uint32_t Argument = 0;
01067   do
01068   {
01069     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_20_1 >>> */
01070     if (SDMMC004_Handle.State & SDMMC004_STATE_NO_CARD )
01071     {
01072       break;
01073     }/* End of "if ((SDMMC004_Handle.State & SDMMC004_STATE_NO_CARD )!= 1)" */
01074     /* Send Command 15 to deactivate the card */
01075     Argument |= SDMMC004_CardInfo.Rca << SDMMC004_ARG_RCA_BITPOS;
01076     Status = SDMMC004_lSendCommand( &(SDMMC004_COMMON_COMMAND(15)), \
01077                                     Argument, SDMMC004_NO_RESPONSE, NULL);
01078     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_20_2 >>> */
01079     if (Status != (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
01080     {
01081       break;
01082     }
01083     /* Card Cleanup */
01084     SDMMC004_lCardCleanUp();
01085     SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag = 0;
01086   } while(0);
01087   /* Debug Log message .*/
01088   INFO(GID_SDMMC00x,Status,0,0);
01089   return Status; 
01090 }
01091 
01092 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_22 >>> */
01093 /*
01094  * This function brings the SDMMC peripheral out of reset.
01095  */
01096 void SDMMC004_Init()
01097 {
01098   RESET001_DeassertReset(PER1_MMC);
01099 }
01100 
01101 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_23 >>> */
01102 /*
01103  * This function performs the SDMMC LLD App Initialization which includes Host 
01104  * Controller Initialization, Card Initialization and Reading Card Registers.
01105  */
01106 status_t SDMMC004_Start()
01107 {
01108   status_t Status =  (uint32_t)SDMMC004_HOST_CONTROLLER_INITIALIZED;
01109   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_23_1 >>> */
01110   /* Check If Host controller is already Initialized */
01111   if ( (SDMMC004_Handle.State & SDMMC004_STATE_HC_INITIALIZED) == 0)
01112   {
01113     /* Enable Interrupt */
01114     NVIC_SetPriority (SDMMC0_0_IRQn, NVIC_EncodePriority(NVIC_GetPriorityGrouping(), \
01115                       SDMMC_PREEMPTION_PRIORITY,SDMMC_SUB_PRIORITY));
01116     NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ(SDMMC0_0_IRQn);
01117     NVIC_EnableIRQ(SDMMC0_0_IRQn);
01118     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_23_1 >>> */
01119     /* Host Controller Initialize */
01120     Status = SDMMC004_HostControllerInit();
01121   }
01122   return Status;
01123 }
01124 
01125 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_24 >>> */
01126 /*
01127  * This function performs the SDMMC LLD App Initialization which includes Host Controller Initialization,
01128  * Card Initialization and Reading Card Registers.
01129  */
01130 status_t SDMMC004_CardDetectionSupport()
01131 {
01132   status_t Status;
01133   /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_24_1 >>> */
01134   Status = SDMMC004_lCardIdentificationProcess();
01135   if (Status == (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS)
01136   {
01137     SDMMC004_Handle.InitializeFlag = 1;  
01138   }
01139   return Status;
01140 }
01141 #if SDMMC_CARD_DETECTION_SUPPORT
01142 /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_25 >>> */
01143 /*
01144  * This function registers the call back function of upper layer which will be 
01145  * invoked from low-level driver if card is inserted or removed in the kit
01146  * supporting Card detection mechanism.
01147  */ 
01148 status_t SDMMC004_RegisterCallBack( SDMMC004_PtrToCallBackFunction \
01149                                     CallbackFunction)
01150 {
01151   status_t Status = SDMMC004_ERROR;
01152   do
01153   {
01154     /* Check Function Pointer is Not Null */
01155     /* <<< DD_SDMMC_API_25_1 >>> */
01156     if (CallbackFunction == NULL )
01157     {  
01158       break;
01159     }
01160     SDMMC004_Handle.CallBackPtr = CallbackFunction; 
01161     Status = (uint32_t)DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
01162   } while(0);
01163   return Status;
01164 }
01165 #endif
